alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 24 at 3:18PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chambers and southeastern Liberty Counties through 400 PM CST... At 317 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anahuac, or 16 miles east of Beach City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anahuac, Winnie and Stowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
